hint: Filter dimension tables first and push predicates down to reduce intermediate data; use CTEs to avoid recomputing repeated subqueries.
Isolate date and store dimension filters into separate CTEs to enable predicate pushdown and optimize join ordering.
Pre-filter and pre-join dimensions with fact data in CTEs, then restructure aggregations and window functions to minimize passes.
Transform the correlated subquery into a join, consolidate multiple fact table scans, and explore advanced pattern rewrites like INTERSECT-to-EXISTS.
